channel.title: Wilderness Levels
channel.description:
Hello, im in the process of coding my server but im stuck on adding in wilderness levels and so only players can attack another player in combat range of the wilderness level.
Can anyone link me a tutorial on adding wilderness levels and so players can only attack others that are in level range of the wilderness level.
Thanks.
